titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives and ranking a Member on a certain standing committee of the House of Representatives.
Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives and ranking a Member on a certain standing committee of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Oversight and Accountability

bill.summary: This resolution elects designated Members to the Committee on the Judiciary, the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, and the Committee on Financial Services of the House of Representatives.
